_header: Some time I loved as ye may see
_description: A Slighted Lover’s Complaint — nine quatrains (aaab) and burden (b): Who so lyst to loue god send hym right good spede

CULFf16.First Lines:
Some tyme y loued as ye may seeA goodlyer there myght none
                    beHere womanhede in all degrefull well she quytt my
                    mede…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…May them rewarde so that they mayWith ioy there lyues
                    lede
